codeExample.title: Form Layout
codeExample.code:
import { FlexColumn, Text, Input, Button } from '@/components/primitives';

spacer.title: Spacer
spacer.description: Cross-platform spacing component for layout control
quickTips: Use for consistent spacing between elements
Works in both horizontal and vertical layouts
Size prop controls the amount of space
Better than manual margins for responsive design

codeExample.title: Layout Spacing
codeExample.code:
import { Spacer, Text, Button } from '@/components/primitives';

<FlexColumn>
  <Text>First section</Text>
  <Spacer size="lg" />
  <Text>Second section</Text>
  <Spacer size="md" />
  <Button type="primary">Action</Button>
</FlexColumn>

// SPACER-BORDER-SPACER pattern
<FlexColumn>
  <Text>Section 1</Text>
  <Spacer
    spaceBefore="md"
    spaceAfter="md"
    border={true}
    direction="vertical"
  />
  <Text>Section 2</Text>
</FlexColumn>
